book.synopsis: Roland, the Last Gunslinger, and his companions--Eddie Dean and Susannah--cross the desert of damnation, drawing ever closer to the Dark Tower, a legion of fiendish foes, and revelations that could alter the world. Reissue.
book.dimensions: Height: 7.25 Inches, Length: 4.5 Inches, Weight: 0.65 Pounds, Width: 1.5 Inches
